Ogyo Poetry
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Ogyo Poetry
By KalaragiOgyo on Saturday, April 5, 2003 - 04:43 pm:

With an Ogyo, you can't go wrong
Because Ogyos are so darn strong.
Breeza, Galberra, and Odyu,
Choose which one is right for you.
Ogyos may be a little prissy,
But in battle, they're no sissy!
So go ahead and train this Queen of Fish,
If a strong monster is what you wish.

By KalaragiOgyo on Sunday, April 13, 2003 - 04:48 pm:

Here's another rappin' rhyme-
Ogyos win all the time!
With Final Dance, its always right,
Ogyo, in the Champion spotlight.
Perfection to the very best,
Ogyo isn't fooled by a jest.
If you haven't heard, raise an Ogyo,
Encourage it with "GO! GO! GO!"
